title: How to Create a Custom Windows Command Prompt

steps.title: Type 'cmd' in the field and hit enter
steps.content: Type 'cmd' in the field and hit enter

steps.title: Type 'prompt', followed by the desired prompt string.
steps.content: Type 'prompt', followed by the desired prompt string.

steps.title: The new prompt is displayed at the new line.
steps.content: The new prompt is displayed at the new line.

steps.title: Type 'prompt' in the variable name field.
steps.content: Type 'prompt' in the variable name field.

steps.title: Type the desired prompt string in the variable value field.
steps.content: Type the desired prompt string in the variable value field.

steps.title: Click OK on each opened dialog.
steps.content: Click OK on each opened dialog.
